db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates combining Qt Quick and three.js rendering.
This documentation was introduced in QtCanvas3D 1.0.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/canvas3d/threejs/$$TARGET INSTALLS += target
SOURCES += main.cpp
OTHER_FILES += *.qml \ planets.js \ doc/src/* \ doc/images/*
RESOURCES += planets.qrc
ios { ios_icon.files = $$files($$PWD/ios/AppIcon*.png) QMAKE_BUNDLE_DATA += ios_icon QMAKE_INFO_PLIST = ios/Info.plist }
EXAMPLE_FILES += \ ios
